text: Bardelys the Magnificent is a 1926 American romantic drama movie directed by King Vidor and based on the 1906 novel of the same name by Rafael Sabatini. It stars John Gilbert, Eleanor Boardman, Lionel Belmore, Arthur Lubin, Emily Fitzroy, John Wayne, Edward Connelly, Theodore von Eltz and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1926 romantic drama movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by King Vidor
title: Bardelys the Magnificent
